Reference

All functions

addBatchtoolsAlgorithms()

Adds batchtools algorithms and experiments.

addBatchtoolsProblems()

Adds batchtools problems.

addColumn()

Helper function. Needs a function, which has a dataframe as input and a vector of length nrow(dataframe) as output.

addColumnByGroup()

Helper function. Needs a function, which has a dataframe as input and a vector of length nrow(dataframe) as output. This function will be evaluated grouped by group_col.

addDate()

Adds column 'date' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

addDateTime()

Adds column 'date_time' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

addStudyDay()

Helper function. It takes the mininum of timestamp as first day and labels oncoming days with the time difference to this day.

addStudyDayByGroup()

Helper function. For each group variable it takes the mininum of timestamp as first day and labels oncoming days with the time difference to this day.

addTime()

Adds column 'time' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

addWeekday()

Adds column 'weekday' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

calcFeature()

Calculates a given function grouped by group_col.

calcStudyDay()

Helper function. Takes the mininum of timestamp as first day and labels oncoming days with the time difference to this day.

checkTimeFormat()

Helper function. Checks if character has correct time format 'hh:mm:ss'.

collectResults()

Collects results.

divideDataIntoIntervals()

Helper function. Adds a new column, which divides the dataset into intervals of a given length. The base R function cut is used with include.lowest = TRUE. Values larger than the biggest cut point will be assigned a new interval.

filterDaytime()

Filter function. Filters the data by weekdays. The dataset can e.g. be filtered by all days between monday and friday. The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'weekday'.

filterWeekday()

Filter function. Filters the data by weekdays. The dataset can e.g. be filtered by all days between monday and friday. The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'weekday'.

getProjectStatus()

Summarizes the projects status.

loadProject()

Loads fxtract project.

makeProject()

Iniates batchtools functionality

phonedata

phonedata

slidingWindow()

Adds a variable (or a set of variables) to a dataset by a sliding window approach.

sqlToRds()

Writes single RDS files from an SQL database.

studentlife_small

studentlife_small

timeToSec()

Helper function. Converts "hh:mm:ss" into number of seconds.

Contents

  • All functions
